transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello. Hello, Sangeeta sorry. Ab aawaz aa rahi hai sir meri aapko proper?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Haan sir, main yeh keh raha tha sir ki aap kuch keh rahe the. Main yeh keh raha hu sir jaise abhi maine bataya na ki linear glass scale ki buyleads available hai aur aapke products mein bhi yeh category add hai sir. Toh yeh irrelevant kyun hai sir aapke liye?
Customer: Haan, theek hai, main ek dum lenge na kabhi.
Executive: Theek hai.
Executive: Dusra sir yeh CNC machine aap bol rahe ho main hai aur CNC machine, right sir?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Ek minute sir, CNC machine ki bhi buyleads dekho. Aur sir iske buyleads ke alawa koi issue sir? Jaise jo buyer se baat karte ho usme koi issue aa raha hai?
Customer: Kaise?
Executive: Main keh raha hu sir jo buyleads aap consume karte ho, buyer se baat karte ho usme kya issue aa raha hai sir? Matlab buyer kyun mana kar deta hai sir? Response nahi karta hai ya phir price mein issue aa raha hai buyer ke end se?
Customer: Sir response wali baat hi nahi, mere ko buylead aa hi nahi rahi jo chahiye. Main toh bol raha hu baar baar aap logo ko. Mere ko Isa controller ki chahiye, CNC Isa controller, CNC Dilon controller. Mere ko uski buylead chahiye bas. Aap toh pata nahi duniya bhar ki kaun si buylead dete rehte ho jo mere kaam ki nahi hai.
Executive: Sir dekho aisa nahi hai, jo aapke keywords add hote hai na sir usse hi relevant buyleads aati hai sir. Aisa nahi ki hum koi bhi, hum sirf manual koi bhi buyleads nahi jaati hai sir. Saare aapke jo catalog mein add honge usse hi relevant buyleads aayengi. Agar CNC machine ke liye aapko
Customer: CNC, Isa controller, Dilon controller uski buylead toh aati hi nahi hai mere ko.
Executive: Abhi sir yeh CNC controller ki aayi hai Haryana se, aapne dekha?
Customer: Hain?
Executive: CNC controller ki aayi hai sir yeh kaam ki hai?
Customer: Sir CNC controller kaun maangta hai yeh? Main baar baar aap logo ko bol raha hu Isa controller, Dilon controller. Aap baar baar CNC controller, CNC controller, CNC controller, mere toh hazaro controller aate hai.
Executive: Ek minute sir, ek minute, ek minute sir. Please sir aap naraz mat hoiye, ek minute main dekh raha hu aapka sir.
Executive: Sir yeh WhatsApp number hai aapka?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Ek minute sir, bas ek minute mujhe dijiye bas. Abhi sir aap, abhi matlab aap available ho sir 10 minute ke liye? Bas main zyada samay nahi lunga, main 10 minute lunga sir aapka. Abhi
Customer: Main drive kar raha hu. Nahi main drive kar raha hu.
Executive: Abhi drive? Abhi drive kar rahe ho aap? Phir aap WhatsApp bhi nahi dekh paoge aap?
Customer: Nahi dekh paunga.
Executive: Hmm. Koi aisa sir please chahiye tha but aap is time office mein, office mein raho jis time main
Customer: Office mein kal, office mein kal lunga.
Executive: Haan ji.
Executive: Theek hai, main 11 baje phone karu sir aapko?
Customer: Haan, 11 baje phone kar lijiye, WhatsApp dekh lunga sir.
Executive: Theek hai. Theek hai, main WhatsApp pe main upload kar raha hu sir aapko.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants buyleads for Isa and Dilon controllers.

- Receiving irrelevant buyleads.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to check the issue.

- Executive will call back at 11 AM.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back at 11 AM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, cnc controller, isa controller, dilon controller
